entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Pred block link in handler PHI args are of questionable utility #94981
  • System.Net.Security is not supported on os-wasi #94980
  • [API Proposal]: `Delegate.UnsafeCreateFromPointer` #94977
  • [API Proposal]: `RuntimeFieldHandle.Offset` #94976
  • [API Proposal]: `UnsafeAccessor` for member handles #94975
  • JIT: EH successors do not account for handler -> handler flow in the presence of filters #94974
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DefaultMeterFactory should probably not be internal #94972
  • short.Parse regression in .NET 8.0 from 7.0 #94971
  • NullReferenceException in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #94968
  • [Enhancement] Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #94967
  • How to debug code that is being compiled in layers? I have the following problem #94964

Closed

  • OptionsValidatorGenerator does not generate a Validate method #94912
    9.0.0
  • OptionsValidatorGenerator does not reset the ValidationContext before calling IValidatableObject.Validate #94910
    9.0.0
  • net 8.0 cannot compile nativeAOT executable for macOS x64. #94973
  • ECDsa.TrySignData(...) returns true, with bytes written == 64 for null values #93972
    8.0.x
  • AES-GCM is supported for `net8.0` TFM but not for `net8.0-maccatalyst` TFM #94848
    9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] memory access out of bounds in string manipulation #94773
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][wasm] Fix broken VM suspend while emitting events in Debug configuration #94982
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #94979
    area-System.Security
  • Fix typo in testenv for cross-block local assertion prop #94978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Allow scalar valuetypes with r4/r8 members. #94969
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix incorrect stack type information #94966
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #94965
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] debugger tests: remove duplicate container-detected messages #94963
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 119.0.6045.159, windows: 119.0.6045.160 #94962
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Fix option source generator with self-validator classes #94943
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix incorrect stack type information #94923
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • P/Invokes should use C types not C++. #94942
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #94861
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix comment typo in jithelp.asm #94956
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to target .NET 6 Mac Catalyst with .NET 8 SDK on Windows #37026
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk project is not running as startup project if it resides inside of a solution folder #37024

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow any viable types to be used in "Move static members" and warn before creating a class #70896
  • "Move static members" prepends the current namespace twice after the textbox is edited #70895
  • Compiler failure introduced with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp v4.4.0 #70894
  • The default parameter value for struct and record struct is ignored when a new instance is created #70892
  • Refinement on the message for CS0103, or a new rule. #70891

PullRequests

Created

  • Move our OOP syncing code off of source-text checksums, onto content hashes. #70893
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove ImmutableDictionary usage when passing telemetry property information. #70845
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add SourceText.GetContentHash #70838
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool intermediary collections when performing classification tagging/aggregation. #70884
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In the Blazor Web App Template, a policy works using the attribute Authorize for the page but not for the AuthorizeView inside the page when the page is in the client project #52199
  • blazor ignoring UsePathBase middleware #52198
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #52197
  • Creating a Blazor project with a space in its name breaks the styling #52196
  • Unable to define an optional DateOnly field in blazor EditForm using InputDate component #52195
  • SecurityTokenMalformedException after updating to .NET 8 #52191
  • Application not working when upgrading from RC2 to the final version #52190
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, updates #52188
  • blazor: please add InteractiveHybrid mode！ #52187

Closed

  • Blazor Web app with RenderMode.InteractiveWebAssembly requires services to be registered in App in addition to App.Client #52155
  • Blazor WebAssembly Shared UI Library #45451
    Planning: WebUI
  • Perf regression: json #52189
  • @microsoft/signalr Version 8.0.0 throws error when used with Angular 17 #52192
  • Add some way to specify indeterminate checkboxes in blazor #10378
    Planning: WebUI
  • Adopt runtime settings from runtimeconfig.json in Blazor #35010
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor - .Net 8 - Quick Grid - Sorting and Filtering Broken #52101
  • Perf improvement: updates #52181
  • Framework location path should be configurable #5582
    Planning: WebUI
  • Ability to declare child content that do not set aside component re-render encapsulation #27017
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM Standalone Authentication with CSP Portal #30215
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor: InputText emit required attribute based on DataAnnotations #16650
    Backlog
  • Razor Component elements can't use arbitrary complex types in rendering #13062
    Planning: WebUI
  • Consider aligning how the @page directive works in razor components with how it works in razor pages #8787
    Planning: WebUI
  • Continue reducing the size of Blazor WebAssembly apps #45010
    Planning: WebUI

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with many items (10,000+) hangs or crashes on Windows and iOS #18891
  • Splash screen bug #18890
  • Mediapicker API is inconsistent across platforms on cancellation #18889
  • [.NET8] ShellContent x:Name doesn't work when used with OnPlatform #18887
  • [MAUI 8.0.3] Grid in CollectionView HeaderTemplate takes the whole page in iOS #18886
  • iOS : if Splashscreen is not set, Status Bar is always visible #18885
  • Switch BackgroundColor properties are not updated from ViewModel #18884
  • ScrollView Orientation="Horizontal" RTL ios ​​not working In .NET 8 Maui #18883
  • ListView does not populate items correctly on iOS #18882
  • CollectionView with IsGrouped and GridItemsLayout performance issue with Images #18881
  • Microsoft.Maui.Storage.FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory + CacheDataDirectory Broken - Windows 10 #18880
  • Problem initializing the CurrentItem for the Carousel #18879
  • IPreferences give System.NotSupportedException when setting enum value #18878
  • [.NET 8 & .NET 7] Poor performance in scrolling in the image list. #18877
  • [.NET 8] SkiaBitmapExportContext.SKImage.Encode JPEG compression bug when encoding the image. #18876
  • [.NET8] Flickering occurs due to padding while navigating pages. #18875

Closed

  • [Proposal] Bring up nightly release builds like on Xamarin.Forms #12079
    Backlog
  • [.NET 8 & VS 17.8.0] XAML Live Preview- Showing component boundaries does not work #18873

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11" #18888

Updated

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LazyLoader retains references to the EF model after it has been detatched/disposed #32348

PullRequests

Updated

  • Attempt to fix 32154 #32157

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. Either target .NET 8.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 9.0. Download the .NET SDK from https://aka.ms/dotnet/download #17426
  • Installer for v8.0.100 fails to restore/build: Missing Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Aspire.Manifest-8.0.100 #17797
